screening algorithms.sentence:
The present study employed an RCPT (Rapid Chloride Permeability Test) to evaluate the chloride permeability of all the concrete samples, which involved immersing standard concrete cylinders in a 1% NaCl solution for 24 h.

In the present study, we employ an accelerated laboratory test called Rapid Chloride Permeability Test (RCPT), and a method to visualize Cl- penetration depth on fractured surfaces.

experimental methodology.sentence:
The document does not mention any new or novel experimental methodology used.

ML algorithms.sentence: The major components of PC include alite (C3S), belite (C2S), tricalcium aluminate (C3A) and tetracalcium alumina of ferrite (C4AF), while MgO consists of MgO and some minor quantities of quartz and anhydrite, as indicated in Fig. 1.

models.sentence: The principle of this method is based on the precipitation of whitish silver chloride, when silver nitrate is sprayed on Cl- penetrated areas, and brownish silver oxide precipitation, when silver nitrate is sprayed on OH- rich areas.

lead small-molecule drug candidates.sentence: The authors have developed and evaluated the r-MgO-PC concretes with different MgO contents, which may be related to identifying new lead small-molecule drug candidates.
